publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4105 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Dumbarton FC—That the Parliament congratulates Dumbarton Football Club for winning the Third Division of the Scottish Football League; applauds the efforts of Jim Chapman and the team; recognises the unstinting support of the fans and the Sons Supporters Trust, and looks forward to similar success in the Second Division next year. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-4105 Congratulations to Dumbarton FC (lodged on 11 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4105 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Dumbarton FC—That the Parliament congratulates Dumbarton Football Club for winning the Third Division of the Scottish Football League; applauds the efforts of Jim Chapman and the team; recognises the unstinting support of the fans and the Sons Supporters Trust, and looks forward to similar success in the Second Division next year. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
S3M-4105 Congratulations to Dumbarton FC (lodged on 11 May 2009) Jack McConnell*

S3M-4105 Congratulations to Dumbarton FC (lodged on 11 May 2009) Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Gillon*, Stuart McMillan*, George Foulkes*, Aileen Campbell*, Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*, Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Butler*, James Kelly*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4105 Congratulations to Dumbarton FC (lodged on 11 May 2009) Lewis Macdonald*
